item.title: Working with SSL/TLS - Part-02
item.description: Overview In previous post, we hav learn basics of SSL/TLS. now we will see following things: Basics and terminologies of Certificates. Setting up own CA Simple HTTPS server In some cases it may make more sense to act as your own CA, rather than paying a CA like DigiCert. Common cases include securing an intranet website, or for issuing certificates to clients to allow them to authenticate to a server (eg, Apache, OpenVPN).
